Save Our Seas 2.0: Improving Domestic Infrastructure to Prevent Marine Debris Act
A bill to provide for the improvement of domestic infrastructure in order to prevent marine debris, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Save Our Seas 2.0: Improving Domestic Infrastructure to Prevent Marine Debris Act
This bill seeks to address plastic waste in water by establishing grants and strategies for states, units of local government, Indian tribes, public water systems, nonprofit organizations, and local postconsumer materials management entities.
